title: sections 43D and 43F of the Insurance Act 1989 (No.3 of 1989), the Bank hereby
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Non-Life Insurance (Provision
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Non-Life Insurance (Provision 

of Information) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 September 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited non-life insurance (provision information) (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation come operation 1 september 2021

text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulation” means the Non-Life 

Insurance (Provision of Information) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 74 of 2007).

title: sections 43D and 43F of the Insurance Act 1989 (No.3 of 1989), the Bank hereby

title: sections 43D and 43F of the Insurance Act 1989 (No.3 of 1989), the Bank hereby
heading: 4. Regulation 6(5) of the Principle Regulation is amended by deleting, after
text_raw:
4. Regulation 6(5) of the Principle Regulation is amended by deleting, after 
the words “the information referred to in Regulations 6(1)(a) to (j)”, the words 
“and (4)”. 

Signed for and on behalf of the CENTRAL BANK OF IRELAND 

 23 August 2021 

DERVILLE ROWLAND, 

 Director General (Financial Conduct) 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th August, 2021.

title: sections 43D and 43F of the Insurance Act 1989 (No.3 of 1989), the Bank hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Non-Life Insurance (Provision 
of Information) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 74 of 2007).
